page.title: 11LOCAL AUTHORITIES
page.content: This area is administered by four different bodies contained in two authorities. There are {three Parish {Councils}who work under the shelter of {North East Derbyshire County Council } whose main offices are situated at { {Matlock,}with the{North East County {Office }dealing with this area, situated in { Chesterfield.}The three Parish Councils are, {Brampton, {Barlow and Baslow, } whilst {Upper {Newbold}and part of{Cutthorpe}come under the rule of{Chesterfield {Borough Council. Postal Services}are covered from Chesterfield for all areas except {Barlow }which is covered by{Sheffield. }Water comes under the { {Severn-Trent board,}whilst{Electricity is supplied by the{East Midland {Electricity Board. }Telephones are maintained by{British Telecom,}with four boxes in this area.
